articles.title: Wondering how Total Solar Eclipse looked from space? Here's NASA's video - India Today
articles.description: As parts of Canada North America and Mexico plunged into complete darkness briefly on April 8 due to the Total Solar Eclipse NASA flight engineers captured a different perspective of the rare celestial event from space
articles.content: While parts of North America, Mexico and Canada plunged into darkness momentarily due to the Total Solar Eclipse on April 8, crew members of the International Space Station captured a different persp… [+3113 chars]
